column2: "Na ntoboa a wɔdze kɛma ahotseweefo no ho dze
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mehyehyɛɛ no asɔrasɔr a ɔwɔ Galatia mu no

column2: "Dapɛn mu da a odzi kan no
column3: hom nyina ntsiatsia ngu hom nkyɛn nkorkor
column4: dɛ mbrɛ obiara esi no yie

column2: "Na sɛ mubodu a
column3: hɔn a hom dze nwoma bɛkyerɛ dɛ wɔfata dɛm edwuma no
column4: mobɔsoma hɔn dze hom akyɛdze no akɔ Jerusalɛm;"

column2: "na sɛ ɔsɛ dɛ mo so mokɔ a
"Na mikesi Masidonia a
column3: mebɛba hom nkyɛn; osiandɛ Masidonia na mirikesi."

column2: "Na hom nkyɛn na annyɛ a mebɛtsena menye hom edzi awɔwber mpo
column3: na beebiara a mobɔkɔ no hom eegya me kwan."

column2: "Na afei dze memmpɛ dɛ sɛ murutwa mu nko a na mubohu hom; na sɛ Ewuradze ma ho kwan a
column3: m’enyi da dɛ mebɛkyɛr hom nkyɛn kakra."

column2: "Na mebɛkyɛr Efeso ekodu Pentekost da no:"
"osiandɛ woebue abow a wodua mu dzi dwuma ama me
column3: na mbom atamfo a wɔwɔ ho no dɔɔ so."

column2: "Na sɛ Timoti ba a
column3: hom nhwɛ ma ɔaammfa hu nye hom anntsena: osiandɛ ɔyɛ Ewuradze edwuma no bi dɛ mbrɛ mo so meyɛ."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma obi mmbu no enyimtsia. Na hom ngya no kwan asomdwee mu ma ɔmbra me nkyɛn: na morotweɔn ɔno nye enuanom no."
"Na onua Apollos ho dze
column3: meserɛɛ no pii dɛ ɔnye enuanom no mbra hom nkyɛn
column4: na ɔannyɛ ne pɛ koraa dɛ ɔbɛba sesei; na onya mu kwan a

column2: "Hom nweɔn
column3: hom ngyina gyedzi no mu pintsinn

column2: "Hom nyɛ hom adze nyina wɔ ɔdɔ mu."
"Na meserɛ hom
column5: dɛ wɔyɛ Akaia edwuma no mu aba a odzi kan
column6: na dɛ wɔdze hɔnho ama a wɔrosom ahotseweefo no

column2: "dɛ hom so mbrɛ homho adze mma dɛm nkorɔfo no
column3: nye obiara a ɔboa wɔ edwuma no mu na ɔberɛ."

column2: "Na m’enyi gye wɔ Stefanas nye Fotunatus nye Akaikus hɔn mbaa no ho
column3: na dza aka hom afamu no wɔabɛyɛ ama me."

column2: "Na wɔabɔdwedwe mo sunsum nye homdze: hom ndzi hɔn a wɔtse dɛm no nyi yie."
"Asia asɔrasɔr kyiakyia hom. Akwila nye Priska kyia hom pii wɔ Ewuradze mu
column3: nye asɔr a ɔwɔ hɔn fie no."

column2: "Enuanom nyina kyia hom. Hom mfa mfewano krɔnkrɔn nkyiakyia homho."
"Emi Paul me nsaano nkyia nye yi."
"Sɛ obi nndɔ Ewuradze a
"Ewuradze Jesus Kraest adom nka hom."
"Mo dɔ nka hom nyina wɔ Kraest Jesus mu. Amen."
